title: Lola, érase una vez
overview: This is the romantic and fun story of Lola, a modern Cinderella, rebellious and optimistic, who does not sit back and wait for a fairy godmother to solve her problems with her wand, but goes out into the world to find happiness on her own.Lola, érase una vez, is a beautiful story for young people and their families, a modern fairy tale, but full of music, joy, emotion, optimism and, above all, love.
